oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-02-20 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from February 20, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ferlin Husky (host/performer), guest performer Jimmy C. Newman, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones with Ramona Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1063rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ferlin Husky; Jordanaires; Archie Campbell; Jimmy C. Newman; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ferlin Husky -- Black Sheep (Ferlin Husky, Jordanaires) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ferlin Husky) -- Ferlin Husky introduces Archie Campbell -- Comedy routine (Archie Campbell, Ferlin Husky) -- Grant Turner and Ferlin Husky introduce Jimmy Newman -- I Miss You Already (Jimmy C. Newman) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ferlin Husky) -- Grant Turner introduces Tommy Jackson -- Bill Cheatham (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Grant Turner and Ferlin Husky talk -- Peace In The Valley (Ferlin Husky, Jordanaires) -- Grant Turner introduces Chet Atkins -- Dream Train (Chet Atkins)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jordanaires (Musical group); Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jones, Ramona; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Minnie Pearl; Husky, Ferlin; Newman, Jimmy C.
